member.name: CERT_CRL_CONTEXT_PAIR
member.summary: The CERT_CRL_CONTEXT_PAIR structure contains a certificate context and an associated CRL context.

member.name: CERT_CRL_CONTEXT_PAIR.pCertContext
member.summary: A pointer to a certificate context.

member.name: CERT_CRL_CONTEXT_PAIR.pCrlContext
member.summary: A pointer to the certificate revocation list context.
